statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, pricing FROM products WHERE sales_channel = 'Online';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE pricing > 100.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%Tool%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, pricing, sales_channel FROM products WHERE pricing > 1000 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM products WHERE sales_channel = 'Online' ORDER BY product_name ASC, pricing DESC
SELECT product_name, pricing FROM products WHERE sales_channel IN ('Online', 'Retail')
SELECT product_name, pricing FROM products WHERE pricing BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY pricing
SELECT * FROM products WHERE sales_channel = 'Retail' AND pricing < 500
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesChannel WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT channel_name, contact_name FROM SalesChannel WHERE channel_name LIKE '%Online%';
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM Product GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, sc.channel_name, sc.region FROM Product p JOIN SalesChannel sc ON p.product_id = sc.channel_id WHERE p.price < 500 AND sc.region = 'North America';

SELECT channel_name, contact_name, contact_email, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM SalesChannel sc JOIN Product p ON sc.channel_id = p.product_id GROUP BY channel_name, contact_name, contact_email HAVING total_products > 10 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, total_price FROM products JOIN product_sales ON products.product_id = product_sales.product_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT channel_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_channels JOIN product_sales ON sales_channels.channel_id = product_sales.channel_id GROUP BY channel_name;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND price < 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT p.product_name, ps.quantity, sc.channel_name FROM products p JOIN product_sales ps ON p.product_id = ps.product_id JOIN sales_channels sc ON ps.channel_id = sc.channel_id WHERE ps.quantity > 10 ORDER BY ps.quantity DESC, sc.channel_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, sale_date FROM products p JOIN product_sales ps ON p.product_id = ps.product_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sale_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT sc.channel_name, SUM(ps.quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(ps.total_price) AS total_sales FROM sales_channels sc JOIN product_sales ps ON sc.channel_id = ps.channel_id GROUP BY sc.channel_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM product;
SELECT name, price FROM product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM product WHERE price > 50 AND price < 100;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM product WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM product;
SELECT * FROM product_sales WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.name, ps.price, s.name as channel FROM product p JOIN product_sales ps ON p.product_id = ps.product_id JOIN sales_channel s ON ps.channel_id = s.channel_id;
SELECT ph.product_id, ph.old_price, ph.new_price, p.name as product_name FROM price_change_history ph JOIN product p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id WHERE ph.change_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT ps.product_id, COUNT(ps.channel_id) as channel_count FROM product_sales ps GROUP BY ps.product_id ORDER BY channel_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM categories JOIN product_category ON categories.category_id = product_category.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT product_id, channel_name, sale_date, quantity FROM product_sales JOIN sales_channels ON product_sales.channel_id = sales_channels.channel_id ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN product_category pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id;

SELECT ps.product_id, ps.channel_id, ps.quantity, pc.category_id FROM product_sales ps JOIN product_category pc ON ps.product_id = pc.product_id WHERE ps.sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.product_name, SUM(ps.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products p JOIN product_sales ps ON p.product_id = ps.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
